price: Bityo, ntugire ubwira (bwo gushaka ko bahanwa), kuko mu by’ukuri tubabarira iminsi ntarengwa.
arabic: فَلَا تَعۡجَلۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡۖ إِنَّمَا نَعُدُّ لَهُمۡ عَدّٗا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: falā taʿjal ʿalayhim innamā naʿuddu lahum ʿaddan
